ygData.messageBody:
Watch out, I'm not kidding that a big spoiler is coming up.

Ok, to make a new spell, you just need the book, and the proper runes. No quills, no paper, just the lexicon and runes.

The two spells I have made so far are Project Lightning and Pillar of Fire.

To make Project lightning you use the runes of Periphery and Fulgeration. For Pillar of Fire you need Proximity and Nagafen.

I can make another of both of these. Tell me if you are interested in buying one of these two spells, or the unbuyable Project Lightning.

You also need books for other spells, the spells these books contain are:
Wizards Cannon:
Identify, Project Lightning, Pillar of fire
Doctrine of Wizardry:
Enstill, Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor, Cast Force, Column of Lightning, Tox Portal, Shock spiral of Al'Kabor, Energy Storm
Ipsors Enlightenment III:
Nullify Magic, Circle of Force, Lava Storm, Thunderclab, Immobilize, Common Portal, Frost Spiral fo Al'Kabor
Ipsors Enlightenment IV:
Gravity Flux, Wrath of Al'kabor, Ice Commet, Super Nova, Paralizing Earth

As you can see the spells you can research vary from level 16 all the way to the ungodly 1100 damage ice commet at level 49.

I'm sure there are other books, but I havn't found them. If you come across them, let me know!

These spells were read off with below average in old Erudian. I'd really love it if someone on the Rathe who has excellent would train me in it. I'll pay 20pp for the honor.

I don't know what paralizing earth is, my guess is that its along the root line of spells. I guess you *have* to research Ice Commet, Super Nova, etc or buy them from a wizard who made them.

You didn't believe me when I said this was a massive spoiler did you?

One last note, I am almost certain that there are more spells you can research. I have a rune that starts with a "V", forget the name of it at this instant. I already translated all the components required to make these spells from these book, and none of them had this rune as a component.

Fastus
21st level Wizard
The Rathe
